comments.author: Julian Reschke
comments.body: That's a bug in the javadoc doclet implementation, see <http://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=5093723>.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: As a workaround to the JDK problem I added explicit class names to all the troublesome {@link #method} links. Thus, fixed in revision 511533. Thanks for the problem report and the link to the Java regression!

description: The creation of JavaDoc fails on project jackrabbit-jcr-server if the command "mvn javadoc:javadoc" is called on the latest checkout of jackrabbit. See attached log...
summary: Creation of JavaDoc fails on jackrabbit-jcr-server
